```{r}
#Libraries
library(mosaic)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
import_df <- read_csv("code/current/data/chemical_data.csv")
glimpse(import_df)

northeast <- import_df %>%
  filter(state %in% c("ME", "NH", "VT", "NY", "PA", "NJ", "MD", "MA", "DE", "RI", "CT")) %>%
  mutate(region = "northeast")

midwest <- import_df %>%
  filter(state %in% c("OH", "IN", "MI", "IL", "WI", "MN", "IA", "MO", "ND", "SD", "NE", "KS"))%>%
  mutate(region = "midwest")

west <- import_df %>%
  filter(state %in% c("WA", "MT", "OR", "ID", "WY", "CA", "NV", "UT", "CO", "AZ", "NM", "AK", "HI"))

south <- import_df %>%
  filter(state %in% c("WV", "VA", "KY", "TN", "NC", "SC", "GA", "FL", "MS", "AL", "LA", "AR", "OK", "TX", "PR"))
```
